required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot HPV Vaccination in Chinese American Community
clinical_study.official_title: Developing and Pilot Testing a Multilevel HPV Vaccination Intervention in Chinese American Community

brief_summary.textblock: This study provides a pioneer model in increasing knowledge of HPV vaccination among Chinese American families through culturally tailored interventions, and eventually increase the HPV vaccine uptake among Chinese American adolescents.

primary_outcome.measure: changes from baseline HPV vaccine uptake rate at 6-month follow up
primary_outcome.description: the rate of getting HPV vaccination uptake 6 months post intervention

secondary_outcome.measure: change of HPV knowledge from baseline to 6-month follow up
secondary_outcome.description: Knowledge scores ranged from 0 to 7, computed by taking the total number of correct answers to the questions with a higher numeric value indicating better knowledge
change in the percents of engaging adolescents in decision-making at post intervention

arm_group.description: The study team provides participants in the intervention group with interventional education, using interactive video watch and dynamic discussion.
The study team provides the participants in the control group with education, using only handouts of vaccinations including HPV, but not using interactive video watch and dynamic discussion

intervention.description: The study team provide participants in the intervention group with interventional education, using interactive video watch and dynamic discussion. The educational videos were aiming to reinforcement and improvement the awareness, knowledge, attitude, intention and actual uptake of HPV vaccination shots among Chinese parents.
Education session conducted using only handouts of vaccinations including HPV

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Self-identified Chinese Parents or legal guardian with children aged 11-18 years old;
2. The children have not received any does of HPV vaccination
Exclusion Criteria:
-

facility.name: Center for Asian Health, Lewis Katz School of Medicine, Temple University
